mapper.select: select c.name cname,o.id oid,a.deliveraddress daddress,a.getaddress gaddress,l.getdate,l.deliverdate,o.code ocode,l.status status from shop_logistic l,shop_commodity c,shop_order o,shop_address a,shop_co co where o.logistic_id=l.id and o.address_id=a.id and co.order_id = o.id and c.id = co.commodity_id and (c.name like #{word} or o.id like #{word} or a.deliveraddress like #{word} or a.getaddress like #{word} or o.orderdate like #{word} or o.code like #{word} or l.status like #{word})

select c.name cname,o.id oid,a.deliveraddress daddress,a.getaddress gaddress,l.getdate,l.deliverdate,o.code ocode,l.status status from shop_logistic l,shop_commodity c,shop_order o,shop_address a,shop_co co where o.logistic_id=l.id and o.address_id=a.id and co.order_id = o.id and c.id = co.commodity_id
mapper.insert: insert into shop_logistic (company, code, status, getdate, deliverdate) values (#{company}, #{code}, #{status}, #{getdate}, #{deliverdate})
